Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone that connects two students over a distance.
The student can illustrate the use of sound as the communication method through the string telephone.
The student can include specific features that show the device can send and receive sound over a given distance.
The student can show only the materials provided are used in making the string telephone (string and cups).
The student can depict how this device solves the problem of communicating over a distance.
The student can illustrate or describe in notes how communicating over long distances helps people.
